spell.name: Summon Archon
entries: You call forth a minor celestial archon. It manifests in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. It takes the form of the archon spirit stat block. When you cast the spell, choose one of:

entries.caption: Archon spirit Stat Block
rows: {@creature archon spirit lantern (2nd-Level Spell)|KTSS|Lantern}, {@creature archon spirit hound (2nd-Level Spell)|KTSS|Hound}, or {@creature archon spirit trumpet (2nd-Level Spell)|KTSS|Trumpet}
{@creature archon spirit lantern (3rd-Level Spell)|KTSS|Lantern}, {@creature archon spirit hound (3rd-Level Spell)|KTSS|Hound}, or {@creature archon spirit trumpet (3rd-Level Spell)|KTSS|Trumpet}
{@creature archon spirit lantern (4th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Lantern}, {@creature archon spirit hound (4th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Hound}, or {@creature archon spirit trumpet (4th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Trumpet}
{@creature archon spirit lantern (5th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Lantern}, {@creature archon spirit hound (5th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Hound}, or {@creature archon spirit trumpet (5th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Trumpet}
{@creature archon spirit lantern (6th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Lantern}, {@creature archon spirit hound (6th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Hound}, or {@creature archon spirit trumpet (6th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Trumpet}
{@creature archon spirit lantern (7th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Lantern}, {@creature archon spirit hound (7th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Hound}, or {@creature archon spirit trumpet (7th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Trumpet}
{@creature archon spirit lantern (8th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Lantern}, {@creature archon spirit hound (8th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Hound}, or {@creature archon spirit trumpet (8th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Trumpet}
{@creature archon spirit lantern (9th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Lantern}, {@creature archon spirit hound (9th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Hound}, or {@creature archon spirit trumpet (9th-Level Spell)|KTSS|Trumpet}

entries: The creature resembles the creature of your choice, which determines certain traits in its stat block. The creature disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.

The creature is allied to you and your companions. In combat, the creature shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It obeys your verbal commands (no action required by you). if you don't issue any,it takes the Dodge action and uses its move to avoid danger.

components.m: an ornate relic worth at least 200 gp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, use the higher level whenever the spell's level appears in the stat block.
{@link Summon Archon|https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-Mg9CDdOF59xQOCp2sOO}

spell.name: Summon Dragon
entries: You call forth a magical dragon spirit. It manifests in an occupied space that you can see within range. It takes the form of the dragon spirit stat block.

When you cast the spell choose a color from the table below. The creature resembles a dragon of that color, which determines certain traits in its stat block based on its color as per the Dragon Table below where listed in traits in its stat block. The creature disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.

The creature is an ally to you and your companions. In combat, the creature shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. If obeys your verbal commands (no action required by you). If you don't issue any,it takes the Dodge action and uses its move to avoid danger.

components.m: a dragon statuette worth at least 500gp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spellslot of 6th level or higher, use the higher level whenever the spell's level appears in the stat block.
{@link Summon Dragon|https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-Mg9CDdOF59xQOCp2sOO}

entries: The dragon makes a number of attacks equal to 2 (half this spell's level (rounded down)). It can only attack with its bite or tail once per turn.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) piercing damage, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

entries: The dragon exhales elemental power in its breath weapon area from the dragon table. trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature.The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporaryhit points.

trait.name: Spider Climb

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
